The following applies to goods and related services to be procured through tendering for the project financed under the complex (consolidated) safety upgrade program of power units of nuclear power plants supervised by the European bank for reconstruction and development (hereinafter also to as “EBRD” or “bank”). potential tenderers desiring additional information on the procurement in question or the project in general, should contact the project management unit and not the EBRD.
Measures:
— No 5204 «Modernize the house 6kV power supply system»,
— No 15208 «Modernize RZA (Relay protection and automation) circuits introducing microelectronics relay»,
— No 15201 «Replace 6 kV switches in SS channels and safety important systems, whole plant and unit systems of SN (House load)»,
— No 15206 «Modernize the distribution device of 0.4 kV».
Request for Proposal (RFP) Nº RFP-15204-15208-15201-15206-115-GOODS-1

The present invitation for tenders follows the general procurement notice for this project, which was published on the EBRD website in "Procurement notices"(www.ebrd.com) on 18.4.2017 (8653-GPN-42086).

The state enterprise “National nuclear energy generating company “Energoatom”, hereinafter referred to as “the purchaser”, intends to use a part of the loan proceeds from the European bank for reconstruction and development and the European atomic energy community (hereinafter referred to as “Euratom”) to cover the costs of the project “Complex (Consolidated) safety upgrade program of power units of nuclear power plants”.
The purchaser hereby invites suppliers to submit their sealed tenders for the following contract to be funded from a part of the loan proceeds:
— Package Nº 115, which includes:
Lot 1 (Measures 15204 and 15201):

— Supply of relay cabinets with relay protection instrumentation modules for 6 kV house-load power supply system, including technical documentation, manufacturing, preliminary, factory acceptance and handover acceptance tests at the manufacturer’s site, delivery, participation in the incoming control, special training of the purchaser’s personnel, installation supervision and adjustment monitoring, participation in the preliminary integrated tests within the nuclear facility at the purchaser’s site prior to commissioning into trial operation at the purchaser’s site, trial operation, participation in the acceptance tests within the nuclear facility prior to commissioning into commercial operation and warranty maintenance within the warranty period (for more detailed information see the technical requirements — for SS Zaporizhzhya NPP Power Units 3, 4, 5, 6 of SE “NNEGC “Energoatom”,

— Supply of 6 kV vacuum circuit breakers, including technical documentation, manufacturing, preliminary, factory acceptance and handover acceptance tests at the manufacturer’s site, delivery, participation in the incoming control, special training of the purchaser’s personnel, installation supervision and adjustment monitoring, participation in the Preliminary Integrated Tests within the Nuclear Facility at the Purchaser’s site prior to commissioning into trial operation at the Purchaser’s Site, trial operation, participation in the Acceptance Tests within the Nuclear Facility prior to commissioning into commercial operation and warranty maintenance within the warranty period (for more detailed information see the Technical Requirements – for SS Zaporizhzhya NPP Power Units 5, 6 of SE “NNEGC “Energoatom”.
Lot 2 (Measures 15208 and 15206):

— Supply of Relay protection and automation of the generator-transformer unit on the microprocessor basis, including technical documentation, manufacturing, preliminary, factory acceptance and handover acceptance tests at the manufacturer’s site, delivery, participation in the incoming control, special training of the purchaser’s personnel, installation supervision and adjustment monitoring, participation in the Preliminary Integrated Tests within the Nuclear Facility at the Purchaser’s site prior to commissioning into trial operation at the Purchaser’s Site, trial operation, participation in the Acceptance Tests within the Nuclear Facility prior to commissioning into commercial operation and warranty maintenance within the warranty period (for more detailed information see the Technical Requirements – for SS Zaporizhzhya NPP Power Units 3, 4, 5, 6 of SE “NNEGC “Energoatom”,

— Supply of Input cabinets’ “Ш-196” type units for RTZO-69 assemblies. Safety system trains, including technical documentation, manufacturing, preliminary, factory acceptance and handover acceptance tests at the manufacturer’s site, delivery, participation in the incoming control, special training of the purchaser’s personnel, installation supervision and adjustment monitoring, participation in the Preliminary Integrated Tests within the Nuclear Facility at the Purchaser’s site prior to commissioning into trial operation at the Purchaser’s Site, trial operation, participation in the Acceptance Tests within the Nuclear Facility prior to commissioning into commercial operation and warranty maintenance within the warranty period (for more detailed information see the Technical Requirements – for SS Zaporizhzhya NPP Power Unit 6 of SE “NNEGC “Energoatom”,

— Supply of House-Load Transformer Substations, including technical documentation, manufacturing, preliminary, factory acceptance and handover acceptance tests at the manufacturer’s site, delivery, participation in the incoming control, special training of the purchaser’s personnel, installation supervision and adjustment monitoring, participation in the preliminary integrated tests within the nuclear facility at the purchaser’s site prior to commissioning into trial operation at the purchaser’s site, trial operation, participation in the acceptance tests within the nuclear facility prior to commissioning into commercial operation and warranty maintenance within the warranty period (for more detailed information see the technical requirements — for SS Zaporizhzhya NPP Power Unit 6 of SE “NNEGC “Energoatom”.
Tendering for contracts financed with the proceeds of the loan from the Bank is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of the contract, tenderers shall satisfy the following minimum criteria:
1 Financial Situation:
The Tenderer shall meet the following minimum criteria:
1.1. Minimum average annual turnover of:
(1) for tenders submitted for Lot 1 only shall be not less than:
10 898 000 (ten million eight hundred ninety eight thousand) EUR equivalent.
(2) for tenders submitted for Lot 2 only shall be not less than:
9 252 000 (nine million two hundred fifty two thousand) EUR equivalent.
(3) for tenders submitted for both Lot 1 and Lot 2 shall be not less than:
20 150 000 (twenty million one hundred fifty thousand) EUR equivalent,
Calculated as total certified payments received for contracts in progress or completed, within the last three (3) years.

— Single entity or individual: must meet the requirements,

1.3. 2. Experience:
The tenderer shall meet the following minimum criteria:

2.1. Successful experience as a supplier in the execution and completion of at least 3 contracts for supply of similar goods (equipment, systems and components) within the last 5 years, for the amount of at least
(1) for tenders submitted for Lot 1 only:
8 173 500 (eight million one hundred seventy three thousand five hundred) Euro equivalent per each contract similar to the contracts for the proposed Goods.
(2) for tenders submitted for Lot 2 only:
6 939 000 (six million nine hundred thirty nine thousand) Euro equivalent per each contract similar to the contracts for the proposed Goods.
(3) for tenders submitted for both Lot 1 and Lot 2:
The tenderer shall satisfy all qualification requirements for general experience as a supplier indicated in this Table 2.4 for Lot 1 and Lot 2 above.
The similarity shall be based on the physical sizes, complexity, methods and technologies and other characteristics as described in technical requirements (Section VI, supply requirements).
The requirements according to the mentioned criteria to separate legal entities and JVCA are as follows:
— Single entity or individual: must meet the requirements,
— JVCA:
—— All partners combined: must meet the requirements,
—— Each partner individually: not applicable,
—— The Lead Partner: not applicable.

The present invitation for tenders follows the general procurement notice for this project, which was published on the EBRD website in "Procurement notices"(www.ebrd.com) on 18.4.2017 (8653-GPN-42086).

The state enterprise “National nuclear energy generating company “Energoatom”, hereinafter referred to as “the purchaser”, intends to use a part of the loan proceeds from the European bank for reconstruction and development and the European atomic energy community (hereinafter referred to as “Euratom”) to cover the costs of the project “Complex (Consolidated) safety upgrade program of power units of nuclear power plants”.
The purchaser hereby invites suppliers to submit their sealed tenders for the following contract to be funded from a part of the loan proceeds:
— Package Nº 115, which includes:
Lot 1 (Measures 15204 and 15201):

— Supply of relay cabinets with relay protection instrumentation modules for 6 kV house-load power supply system, including technical documentation, manufacturing, preliminary, factory acceptance and handover acceptance tests at the manufacturer’s site, delivery, participation in the incoming control, special training of the purchaser’s personnel, installation supervision and adjustment monitoring, participation in the preliminary integrated tests within the nuclear facility at the purchaser’s site prior to commissioning into trial operation at the purchaser’s site, trial operation, participation in the acceptance tests within the nuclear facility prior to commissioning into commercial operation and warranty maintenance within the warranty period (for more detailed information see the technical requirements — for SS Zaporizhzhya NPP Power Units 3, 4, 5, 6 of SE “NNEGC “Energoatom”,
